originContent: CORE‚Äôs ingestion pipeline has four phases designed to capture evolving context:

translatedContent: 1. **Chu·∫©n h√≥a**: Li√™n k·∫øt th√¥ng tin m·ªõi v·ªõi b·ªëi c·∫£nh g·∫ßn ƒë√¢y, chia nh·ªè t√†i li·ªáu d√†i th√†nh c√°c ƒëo·∫°n m·∫°ch l·∫°c ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi gi·ªØ c√°c tham chi·∫øu ch√©o, v√† chu·∫©n h√≥a thu·∫≠t ng·ªØ ƒë·ªÉ khi CORE tr√≠ch xu·∫•t ki·∫øn th·ª©c, n√≥ l√†m vi·ªác v·ªõi ƒë·∫ßu v√†o s·∫°ch, c√≥ b·ªëi c·∫£nh thay v√¨ vƒÉn b·∫£n l·ªôn x·ªôn.

originContent: 1. **Normalization**: Links new information to recent context, breaks long documents into coherent chunks while keeping cross-references, and standardizes terms so by the time CORE extracts knowledge, it‚Äôs working with clean, contextualized input instead of messy text.
translatedContent: 2. **Tr√≠ch xu·∫•t**: R√∫t √Ω nghƒ©a t·ª´ vƒÉn b·∫£n ƒë√£ chu·∫©n h√≥a b·∫±ng c√°ch x√°c ƒë·ªãnh th·ª±c th·ªÉ (con ng∆∞·ªùi, c√¥ng c·ª•, d·ª± √°n, kh√°i ni·ªám), bi·∫øn ch√∫ng th√†nh c√°c ph√°t bi·ªÉu c√≥ b·ªëi c·∫£nh, ngu·ªìn g·ªëc v√† th·ªùi gian, v√† l·∫≠p b·∫£n ƒë·ªì m·ªëi quan h·ªá. V√≠ d·ª•, ‚ÄúCh√∫ng t√¥i vi·∫øt CORE b·∫±ng Next.js‚Äù th√†nh: Th·ª±c th·ªÉ (Core, Next.js), Ph√°t bi·ªÉu (CORE ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn b·∫±ng Next.js), v√† M·ªëi quan h·ªá (ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn b·∫±ng).

originContent: 2. **Extraction**: Pulls meaning from normalized text by identifying entities (people, tools, projects, concepts), turning them into statements with context, source, and time, and mapping relationships. For example, ‚ÄúWe wrote CORE in Next.js‚Äù becomes: Entities (Core, Next.js), Statement (CORE was developed using Next.js), and Relationship (was developed using).
translatedContent: 3. **Gi·∫£i quy·∫øt**: Ph√°t hi·ªán m√¢u thu·∫´n, theo d√µi c√°ch s·ªü th√≠ch thay ƒë·ªïi, v√† b·∫£o t·ªìn nhi·ªÅu g√≥c nh√¨n c√πng ngu·ªìn g·ªëc thay v√¨ ghi ƒë√®, ƒë·ªÉ b·ªô nh·ªõ ph·∫£n √°nh to√†n b·ªô h√†nh tr√¨nh c·ªßa b·∫°n, kh√¥ng ch·ªâ l√† ·∫£nh ch·ª•p m·ªõi nh·∫•t.

originContent: 3. **Resolution**: Detects contradictions, tracks how preferences evolve, and preserves multiple perspectives with provenance instead of overwriting them so memory reflects your full journey, not just the latest snapshot.
translatedContent: 4. **T√≠ch h·ª£p ƒê·ªì th·ªã**: K·∫øt n·ªëi th·ª±c th·ªÉ, ph√°t bi·ªÉu v√† t·∫≠p h·ª£p th√†nh ƒë·ªì th·ªã tri th·ª©c theo th·ªùi gian, li√™n k·∫øt s·ª± ki·ªán v·ªõi b·ªëi c·∫£nh v√† l·ªãch s·ª≠, bi·∫øn d·ªØ li·ªáu r·ªùi r·∫°c th√†nh m·∫°ng l∆∞·ªõi tri th·ª©c s·ªëng m√† c√°c t√°c nh√¢n th·ª±c s·ª± s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c.

originContent: 4. **Graph Integration**: Connects entities, statements, and episodes into a temporal knowledge graph that links facts to their context and history, turning isolated data into a living web of knowledge agents can actually use.

translatedContent: K·∫øt qu·∫£: Thay v√¨ c∆° s·ªü d·ªØ li·ªáu ph·∫≥ng, CORE mang ƒë·∫øn cho b·∫°n b·ªô nh·ªõ ph√°t tri·ªÉn v√† thay ƒë·ªïi c√πng b·∫°n - b·∫£o to√†n b·ªëi c·∫£nh, s·ª± ti·∫øn h√≥a v√† quy·ªÅn s·ªü h·ªØu ƒë·ªÉ c√°c t√°c nh√¢n th·ª±c s·ª± s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c.

originContent: The Result: Instead of a flat database, CORE gives you a memory that grows and changes with you - preserving context, evolution, and ownership so agents can actually use it.

translatedContent: ## C√°ch CORE truy xu·∫•t b·ªô nh·ªõ
Khi b·∫°n h·ªèi CORE m·ªôt c√¢u, n√≥ kh√¥ng ch·ªâ tra c·ª©u vƒÉn b·∫£n‚Äîm√† c√≤n khai th√°c to√†n b·ªô ƒë·ªì th·ªã tri th·ª©c c·ªßa b·∫°n ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m c√¢u tr·∫£ l·ªùi h·ªØu √≠ch nh·∫•t.

originContent: When you ask CORE a question, it doesn‚Äôt just look up text - it digs into your whole knowledge graph to find the most useful answers.

originContent: 1. **Search**: CORE looks through memory from multiple angles at once - keyword search for exact matches, semantic search for related ideas even if phrased differently, and graph traversal to follow links between connected concepts.
translatedContent: 2. **X·∫øp h·∫°ng l·∫°i**: K·∫øt qu·∫£ truy xu·∫•t ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·∫Øp x·∫øp l·∫°i ƒë·ªÉ l√†m n·ªïi b·∫≠t c√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ li√™n quan v√† ƒëa d·∫°ng nh·∫•t, ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o b·∫°n kh√¥ng ch·ªâ th·∫•y c√°c k·∫øt qu·∫£ r√µ r√†ng m√† c√≤n c·∫£ nh·ªØng k·∫øt n·ªëi s√¢u s·∫Øc h∆°n.

originContent: 2. **Re-Rank**: The retrieved results are reordered to highlight the most relevant and diverse ones, ensuring you don‚Äôt just see obvious matches but also deeper connections.
translatedContent: 3. **L·ªçc**: CORE √°p d·ª•ng b·ªô l·ªçc th√¥ng minh d·ª±a tr√™n th·ªùi gian, ƒë·ªô tin c·∫≠y v√† s·ª©c m·∫°nh m·ªëi quan h·ªá, ƒë·ªÉ ch·ªâ nh·ªØng ki·∫øn th·ª©c √Ω nghƒ©a nh·∫•t ƒë∆∞·ª£c hi·ªán ra.

originContent: 3. **Filtering**: CORE applies smart filters based on time, reliability, and relationship strength, so only the most meaningful knowledge surfaces.
4. **Output**: You get back both facts (clear statements) and episodes (the original context they came from), so recall is always grounded in context, time, and story.
translatedContent: 4. **ƒê·∫ßu ra**: B·∫°n nh·∫≠n l·∫°i c·∫£ c√°c s·ª± ki·ªán (kh·∫≥ng ƒë·ªãnh r√µ r√†ng) v√† c√°c t·∫≠p truy·ªán (ng·ªØ c·∫£nh g·ªëc m√† ch√∫ng xu·∫•t ph√°t), v√¨ v·∫≠y vi·ªác ghi nh·ªõ lu√¥n ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·∫∑t trong b·ªëi c·∫£nh, th·ªùi gian, v√† c√¢u chuy·ªán.

originContent: The result: CORE doesn‚Äôt just recall facts - it recalls them in the right context, time, and story, so agents can respond the way you would remember.

originContent: CORE takes security seriously. We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data:
translatedContent: CORE r·∫•t coi tr·ªçng b·∫£o m·∫≠t. Ch√∫ng t√¥i tri·ªÉn khai c√°c ph∆∞∆°ng ph√°p b·∫£o m·∫≠t ti√™u chu·∫©n ng√†nh ƒë·ªÉ b·∫£o v·ªá d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa b·∫°n:

- **X√°c th·ª±c**: OAuth 2.0 v√† x√°c th·ª±c li√™n k·∫øt ma thu·∫≠t
